thread.title: Apply Magic Sauce uses Facebook likes to determine your personality
thread.title_full: Apply Magic Sauce uses Facebook likes to determine your personality - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Apply Magic Sauce uses Facebook likes to determine your personality
text: We all know that Facebook has a lot of information about us, but what exactly can it learn from all that data? Aside from the most obvious -- the things you give it, such as gender, date of birth, place of living, education, work, your favorite sports clubs, music and movies -- it can also conclude a lot of things on its own. Those include your Big Five personality traits (openness, conscientiousness, extraversion, agreeableness, neuroticism), intelligence, life satisfaction, sexual preference, political orientation, relationship status and education -- all based solely and exclusively by what you liked on the site. How… [Continue Reading] »
